meanings.definition: A person in charge of a post office.
meanings.sent1: The postmasters ensure all mail is sorted correctly.
meanings.sent2: The postmasters work diligently to manage the post office efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The postmasters organized a fun event for the community at the post office.
meanings.sent4: The postmasters are the guardians of the mail, protecting it like precious treasure.
meanings.sent5: The postmasters are like the conductors of a symphony, orchestrating the flow of mail.

meanings.sent1: We saw two postmasters chatting outside the post office.
meanings.sent2: The postmasters in this region are known for their dedication to their work.
meanings.sent3: The postmasters decided to dress up as mail carriers for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The postmasters stood tall, a united front in the face of postal challenges.
meanings.sent5: The postmasters gathered, a group of leaders in the world of mail delivery.
